TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlEvidence extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于呈现 安全令牌的授权决定的证据。

span.span: Represents the evidence used to render an authorization decision for a security token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全令牌使用 SAML 断言指定其声明，这些断言可以指定使用者有权访问特定资源的时间。 security tokens specify their claims using SAML assertions, which can specify when the subject was authorized to access a specific resource. SAML 断言中的声明由 SAML 语句表示。The claims in a SAML assertion are represented by SAML statements. SAML 规范定义了一组 SAML 语句类型，其中一个类型为 。The SAML specification defines a set of SAML statement types and one of them is a . 断言已做出了有关主题访问指定资源的授权决定。An asserts an authorization decision regarding access by the subject to the specified resource has been made. 类表示 SAML 授权机构用于呈现 的授权决定的证据。The class represents the evidence used by a SAML authority to render an authorization decision for a . 该证据指定为 SAML 断言或对 SAML 断言的引用，而这两者分别引用 和 属性。The evidence is specified as SAML assertions or a reference to SAML assertions, which refer to the and properties, respectively. ## Examples
